#olifant_mk2 #olifant_mk_2 #olifant_mk_2_liw #olifant #olifantmk2

Realistic AMX30-AUF1 sight.

Sights versions presents in the pack:
-Realistic sight for direct short range shoot (HE rounds)
-Realistic sight for indirect long range shoot (all rounds)
-Customs sights for gunner optic view (HE+smocke, HE-VT+smocke and combined 3 rounds)

watch out on realistic sights if you use the gunner's optic, at short range the gap is important.

Adapted for the game on realistic sights: display of telemeter and distance correction

The folder of the vehicle fr_amx_30_auf_1 is inclued in the download.

South African Ratel 20 Sight

Custom fictional V sight for the ratel 20. Sighted Ranges out to 1000m and can be adjusted using ranging keys. Base Color Black, Highlight Color Yellow.

What´s up everyone!

This is my first Custom Sight I made and I hope you like it.

I designed it in a Battlefield 3/4 look and gave it some nice touch to it to make it fit War Thunder.

If anyone can speak Russian and wants to help make it multilingual just leave a comment and we will get in touch to make it even better. Just a reminder for the translation it has to be done with a native Russian speaker and no Google translation please!

Any recommendations or if you want a custom Sight done feel free to use the comments. (I may be thinking about doing semi-historical skins or s...

a request from .Ryan a sight of 2b

#anime #alltanks #2b

Made a new sight ZTZ99 sight to replace the old one, works for #ztz99a #ztz99_3 #ztz99_2

I may update it at some point to remove the shell list. lmk if its bothersome and I will

(the text moves up a bit when the sight is zoomed out I have no clue why, I've tired to make it not happen and haven't been able to figure it out)

This is the custom reticle that I use in all of my videos.

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCeO8qElmk7ueNHkgHlyuD3w

Extract the files from the zip file to "\War Thunder\UserSights\all_tanks"
If the "all_tanks" folder isn't there, you'll have to make one.

Made by AkulaV
https://www.twitch.tv/akulav_

Description
Version 3.1 of my custom universal sight. Slightly changed without the dot in the center for those that prefer this alternative. Hope you find the sight useful and let me know if you have any feedback!

Custom Sight Version 3.1 Features:

  1. Universal sight works with any tank (including SPAA)
  2. High contrast (green color)
  3. Major markers at 1km, 2km, 3km (quicker to aim and avoids the text overlapping)
  4. Different zoom levels for low to high zoom tanks
  5. No horizontal...

"DUGA-2" SIGHT PACKAGE

Project development is being continued by a different person. To get most actual version go to:

https://discord.gg/umdGKBweRs
OR
https://github.com/tsvl/WT-FCSGenerator

Last update 17.10.2025
- Added the tanks of the latest updates.

This sight allows you to measure the distance to the target using arcs set to the length and width of a notional tank.
...

British VFM5 Sights

Modified CCVL Sights originally made by MochiAPFSDS. Changes made to reflect differences between CCVL and VFM5.


~ Changed Gun/Ammo desc
~ Changed Zoom from 12x-10x
~ Removed FLR Option *Damn Budget Cuts*
~ Changed Highlight Color to Gold

#modern #british

I got bored and this is the result of my boredom. Tomori's signature face as a tank sight.
This is also my first trial doing this, any feedback for problems is appreciated.


Contains 2 .blk files, one featuring the addition above the horizontal line and the second below it for some preference. As this is simply the default crosshair, it shouldn't be altered in any other way besides the obvious one.

Should work for all tanks.
Goes well with ghost shells.

#anime #nao_tomori #all_tanks #charlotte
